title: DEEP HYPNOTIC CONNECTION IN THE FOREST/ NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS
description:
Dr. Marco Paret's students are achieving a deep hypnotic connection in the forest with the powerful techniques that they learned in Dr. Paret's Masterclass in Brazil. Being in the forest is helping them to get in touch with the nature. Their body positions have meaning and deepen the hypnotic induction. This was achieved with the technique of Fascination - the hypnotic power of the gaze, which is exclusively taught by Dr. Paret. Learn all of the powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.

Subscribe to our YouTube channel for more free lessons and useful techniques:
